name: fullstackwebsite
description: Going to need need two package managers: ###Backend This project uses npm: (run npm install) once that is complete run npm init in the project folder and answer the q's to then generated your package.json file ###Front End This porject uses bower: (run npm bower) You then create a bower.rc file and write where you would like bower to isntall its files. Once that is complete run bower init in the project folder ans q's and it will create a bower.json file ###DB This project is going to use the Mongo db
author: Ste Kelehan
